# Contributing to this Plugin

Thank you for considering contributing! To maintain a high standard of quality, please follow these guidelines:

### Reporting Bugs
* Use the **Bug Report** template when opening a new issue.
* Provide your WordPress and PHP versions to help us debug faster.

### Suggestions
* We love feature requests! Please check the existing issues to see if your idea has already been suggested.

### Pull Requests
* Follow [WordPress Coding Standards](https://developer.wordpress.org/coding-standards/).
* Ensure your code is well-commented and tested.
